    CSBuilder
    A Builder pattern class to build CollaborativeSpace for unit test and/or load tests,...
    To use a simpliest form, see CSBuilder.build().
    To have full control, see CSBuilder.buildAsIs().
    For some tests, CSRequest type must be correctly set up in CS Request workspace.
    CSBuilderUtil  
    CSChannelListener

    GuestAccountGroupController
    This data controller on Group clears the Guest Accounts Group's virtual id if it is deleted.
    GuestAccountManager
    This manager provides utility methods about Guest Accounts behavior.
    GuestAccountMemberController
    This DataController: prevents a Member to be added in both non collaborative space groups, and in guests group prevents a Guest to be removed from Guests group without an explicit validation requires a guest to have a valid Email address
    GuestAccountMemberCtxMenuPolicyFilter
    A PolicyFilter that adds a transform contact to guest account menu entry.
    GuestAccountMemberQueryFilter
    This QueryFilter is used only for Guest Accounts logged Members.
    It first filters the MemberQueryHandler to usage Member.USAGE_ACCOUNT.
    It then filters the MemberQueryHandler result collection, using GuestAccountVisibleMemberSelector.
    GuestAccountMemberSelector
    Selects the Members that belong to the Guest Accounts Group.
    GuestAccountPortalPolicyFilter
    Ensures the arrival portal is correct for guest accounts only.
    GuestAccountRequestController
    This data controller will perform common verifications on Guest Account Requests.
    Ensures : the feature is enabled and the Guest Accounts Group exists the form submitter is not null the Guest to initialize is valid
    GuestAccountRightPolicyFilter
    This policy filter filters access for a Guest account on : Publications Categories Groups It also authorizes a guest to see an image FileDocument which has been declared as topbar logo property.
    GuestAccountsConstants
    This class contains some constants about guest accounts.
    GuestAccountVisibleMemberSelector
    Selects the Members that belong to any of the Workspace(s) of the specified guest account, and that are active (ie.

    GuestInitContext

    GuestLoginBuilder
    Default MemberLoginBuilder for a guest account.
    GuestWorkspaceController
    This DataController: forbids writes if guest are added as administrator of space (CSP-760)
    HomePortalSelector
    Returns only Publications being the home portal of their workspace.
    JPortalDataController  
    LeaderFirstComparator
